trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The assassin deals an extra 32 ({@damage 9d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Death Strike (1/short or long rest)
entries: When the Assassin hits a creature with a weapon attack and has advantage on that attack, the creature must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, double the damage of the assassin's attack against the creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The assassin makes two dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) piercing damage.
Trained in the use of poison, assassins are remorseless killers who work for nobles, guildmasters, sovereigns, and anyone else who can afford them.

reaction.name: Unsettling Visage
entries: When a creature makes a weapon attack against the assassin, the assassin can use its reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If Hive fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Confusing Gaze
entries: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the umber hulk and is able to see Hive's eyes, it can magically force the creature to make a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw, unless the umber hulk is {@condition incapacitated}.

On a failed saving throw, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a {@dice d8} to determine what it does during that turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action but uses all its movement to move in a random direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes one melee attack against a random creature, or it does nothing if no creature is within reach.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the umber hulk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the umber hulk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: Hive can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5 foot-wide, 8-foot-high tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Hive has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Hive makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its mandibles, or tentacles.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d12 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d12 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and must succeed on a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by Hive. {@h}55 ({@damage 10d10}) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, Hive kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 6}
entries: Hive magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw or take 30 ({@damage 4d12 + 4}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Claws
entries: Hive makes one attack with its tentacles.

legendary.name: Tentacles
entries: Hive makes one attack with its tentacles.

legendary.name: Extract Brain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Hive uses Extract Brain.

legendary.name: Mind Blast (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Hive recharges its Mind Blast and uses it.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Spellcasting. The Mactar is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The Mactar has the following wizard spells prepared:
footerEntries: spells marked with * are able to be upcasted

action.name: Azorius Lawstaff
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) damage.

action.name: Detain Creature (Incapacitate)
entries: One creature within 30ft of the Mactar must make a {@dc 15} strength saving throw. On a failed save, blue-white manacles appear round the creature's limbs and the creature is {@condition restrained}. While {@condition restrained}, the creature is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Null And Void
entries: When another creature within 30ft takes an action or bonus action that has a magical effect, the Mactar can use its reaction to expend a spell slot of third level or higher. The target must then make a {@dc 15} wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target's action is countered and does not take effect.

trait.name: Improved Detain Creature
entries: While the creature is {@condition incapacitated} by the Mactar's Detain Feature ability, it is {@condition incapacitated}.

reaction.name: Null And Void
entries: When another creature within 30ft takes an action or bonus action that has a magical effect, the Mactar can use its reaction to expend a spell slot of third level or higher. The target must then make a {@dc 15} wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target's action is countered and does not take effect.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Spellcasting. The Astar is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The Astar has the following wizard spells prepared:
footerEntries: spells marked with * are able to be upcasted

action.name: Azorius Lawstaff
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) damage.

action.name: Detain Creature
entries: One creature within 30ft of the Astar must make a DC15 strength saving throw. On a failed save, blue-white manacles appear round the creature's limbs and the creature is {@condition restrained}. While {@condition restrained}, the creature cannot cast spells.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Spellcasting. The Isperar is a 17th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The Isperar has the following wizard spells prepared:
footerEntries: spells marked with * are able to be upcasted

action.name: Azorius Lawstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) damage.

action.name: Detain Creature (Paralyze)
entries: Up to three creature within 30ft of the Isperar must make a DC17 strength saving throw. On a failed save, blue-white manacles appear round the creature's limbs and the creature is {@condition restrained}. While {@condition restrained}, the creature is {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Objection Sustained
entries: Whenever a creature fails a saving throw caused by a spell the Isperar casts that does not deal damage to the creature, or whenever the Isperar casts counterspell or uses its Null And Void feature, it may immediately use the Detain Creature ability on that creature without using an action.

trait.name: Improved Detain Creature
entries: The Isperar's Detain Creature ability can now be maintained on up to three targets at any one time. While the creature is {@condition incapacitated} by the Detain Feature ability, it is {@condition paralyzed}. Additionally, The Isperar's Detain Creature ability can be maintained on up to three creatures at once.

reaction.name: Null And Void
entries: When another creature within 30ft takes an action or bonus action that has a magical effect, the Isperar can use its reaction to expend a spell slot of 3rd level or higher. The target must then make a {@dc 15} wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target's action is countered and does not take effect.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The necromancer is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The necromancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Grim Harvest (1/Turn)
entries: When necromancer kills a creature that is neither a construct nor undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, the necromancer regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d12}) necrotic damage.

Necromancers are specialist wizards who study the interaction of life, death, and undeath. Some like to dig up corpses to create undead slaves. A few use their powers for good, becoming hunters of the undead and risking their lives to save others.
